review: *** ***** ** * **** ************* *** patient friendly cardiologist. He goes into the case history in detail, understand, and treat patients holistically. I visited Max Hospital, Saket few days back with my Father. He was quick to understand his problem and give medications accordingly, and helped to ensure best possible treatment. He never suggest anything which is not in favour of patient. The way he explains everything is so amazing. He is better now. Thankful to him for my father's angioplasty in best possible way. I would recommend all to visit him for any heart related issue.

review: Dr. Rajeev Rathi had been treating my father for heart illness for long. ** ** *** ** *** **** ************* * **** **** ** *****. Advises are perfect and gives ample time to the patient. He performed miracles on my father and saved him from death not once but thrice. I personally consider him as a God in cardiology.
